title: Love game some stuff to say
text:
Hi this game is really good and I love it a lot. Just some stuff I wanna say. I think you should be able to get stars easier like maybe you can get stars from playing the game or doing something in the game but that are used as like rare currency and not purchase only currency. Purchasing stars is also kinda not working for me too. Also I really want you to make a map called titan wich is the name of Saturn’s biggest moon. It has water which is peculiar so there could be a task to collect water. It would be mostly an underground base (there needs to be a bathroom. I’ve always wondered WHERE DO WE PEE ON SKEILD IF THERES NO BATHROOM pls also have greenhouse too) but there is an above ground observation deck. You would be able to go outside of the base and go to the water/ice, there would be rocks (mine rocks task?), craters, and see a cryovolcano (a task that involves Ammonia in the air?). In the sky you would be able to faintly see Saturn (titan has a dense atmosphere). I really want the ziplines on fungle to be used but we will see. Please add this I love titan so much and would love to see this as a map. Also can you guys add the wolf ears back or no idk much about that but I kinda want them back.
So yeah those are my thoughts. Uh bye.

title: The community made this game 1 star
text: I played this game when it first came out. I decided to come back a few years later and only the game is fun. But the people that play this game will drive people away. I joined this one game where people were on call with each other and telling who the imposters were. I called em out on it (bc I died and so did red who was on the phone with blue who was still alive, but red told me this). I tried getting the host to ban them but the host was red. Then turns out most of the people in the game knew each other so they reported me for “foul language”.  And now my account is perm ban. Great game but the community is not worth it.

title: Why it’s good and bad😃😔
text: This game is absolutely amazing and fun. You can play with friends and enjoy mysteries together. My point is, you should get it, yet there are some bad things about the game. First, when I’m playing a game, I might randomly get kicked from the server for doing nothing. Secondly, when I am the imposter, I might be trying to kill somebody in the game, but then some random guy presses “meeting”, though nobody died, and if I’m a crew mate and I’m doing my task, same thing. It just really pisses me off. So, developers, I want you to make sure if someone is calling a meeting, you should make sure that something happened like sabotage, or a death. Not just for no reason. And make sure when people are trying to kick someone, that person they are kicking ACTUALLY did something inappropriate for the game. Otherwise, this game is absolutely amazing and very fun for my and my family.
Be aware of pedophiles on the game
